text: Hello children, I am mister Brundel.
Something bad happened yesterday. Somebody hid all my Spa purple bottles through the school.
Because I know you can do things, I select you to find back all my bottles, I have faith in you!

But watch out! The school isn't without obstacles. On your way you will find supersweet Fanta bottles that want to poison you with sugar. Be sure to kill them off with mentos by pressing the space bar.
I wish you luck and will wait for you at the end.
